description: [``botocore``] This release adds a new TrainingInputMode FastFile for SageMaker Training APIs.
[``botocore``] Adding a new field 'AmplifyFeatureFlags' to the response of the GetBackend operation. It will return a stringified version of the cli.json file for the given Amplify project.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for Lustre 2.12 to FSx for Lustre.
[``botocore``] Amazon Kendra now supports integration with AWS SSO
